title: 89/557/EEC: Council Decision of 10 October 1989 concerning the conclusion of a Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Norway on research and development in the field of the protection of the environment
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 10 October 1989 concerning the conclusion of a Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Norway on research and development in the field of the protection of the environment (89/557/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Norway on research and development in the field of the protection of the environment, is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council shall give the notification provided for in Article 11 of the Agreement (5).
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 10 October 1989.
For the Council
The President
F. DOUBIN
(1) OJ No C 298, 23. 11. 1988, p. 10.
(2) OJ No C 120, 16. 5. 1989, p. 314.
(3) OJ No L 159, 14. 6. 1986, p. 31.
(4) OJ No L 71, 14. 3. 1987, p. 29.
(5) The date of entry into force of the Agreement will be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities by the General Secretariat of the Council.
